channel.title: Sonic 4 - Metal Sonic [Improved Remix]
channel.description:
By improved, I mean, converting it from Auxy4 to Auxy5.
https://soundcloud.com/xtrk/sonic-4-metal-sonics-theme
![image|440x440](upload://gGlPGsMgh6GLDSnPFLhtdIK1jvU.jpeg)
“You might know everything I’m going to do, but that’s now going to help you, because I know everything you’re going to do!
Strange, isn’t it?”
It’s the same remix as before but I added an orchestra beginning and an chiptune ending.
Feedback and Constructive Criticism is allowed!
